index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 24.43, 27.1, 27.8 and 28.4 of the Zoning Ord (86300); amending Sections 5 and 16 of the Subdivision Ordinance (105636); deleting those portions of the zoning Ordinance and Subdivision Ordinance dealing with fees for planned unit developments, rezones, council conditional uses, variances, administrative conditional uses, special exceptions, short plats, and full subdivisions referring to the fees established in the Dept of Construction and Land Use Permit Fee Ordinance.
